entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
